DOC.brief_summary: Study to evaluate the bronchodilator effects of Zyflo CR in patients with chronic stable asthma.
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Bronchodilatory Study in Asthma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of asthma for at least 5 years FEV1 of 5085% predicted Reversible airway obstruction Pregnant/nursing females Liver function tests greater than upper limit of normal
